Class InGameScreen

GameScreen
ca.sfu.cmpt276.fall2025.team14.screens.InGameScreen
public class InGameScreen extends GameScreen
The main gameplay screen used to render the world, background, HUD components, and radiation hazard effects. Handles scaling, background selection, updating game state visuals, and pause display.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    final String
    NAME
    Internal screen name identifier.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    InGameScreen()
    Creates a new in-game screen and loads available background images.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    protected void
    initializeComponents()
    Initializes display components, including the in-game HUD.
    static void
    pickNewBackground()
    Selects a new random background and resets scaling.
    void
    render(Graphics2D g)
    Renders the gameplay world, scaled background, overlays, and radiation effects when active.
    void
    update()
    Updates the screen each tick.

  • Field Details

    • NAME

      public final String NAME
      Internal screen name identifier.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • InGameScreen

      public InGameScreen()
      Creates a new in-game screen and loads available background images. A random background is selected once during construction.

  • Method Details

    • initializeComponents

      protected void initializeComponents()
      Initializes display components, including the in-game HUD.

    • render

      public void render(Graphics2D g)
      Renders the gameplay world, scaled background, overlays, and radiation effects when active. Also draws HUD elements.
      Parameters:
      g - the graphics context to render with

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the screen each tick. Currently empty but required for the interface and future extension of gameplay updates.

    • pickNewBackground

      public static void pickNewBackground()
      Selects a new random background and resets scaling. Called when refreshing level visuals.
